name: Call Escape Grandma's House
description: Do you love Scary Escape Grandma's House ? Do you want to make a call with Grandma's House And Escape ? You're in the right Place! Escape Grandma's House Call, is a Prank App to enjoy it with your friends! You can't made a real call, but what inside the app seems like you will made a call with the Escape Grandmas House Call !!! We hope you like it :) Disclaimer : You can't make a real call, this is just a prank App!
